name: The Celestial Tree VIP
description:
VIP User Benefit : 500 Clover(cash)

1. Unique Graphics
- Beautiful white silhouettes and dreamy and beautiful backgrounds that were not seen anywhere!
Just looking at it calms your mind.

2. Many emotional and listenable background music that calms your mind
- Didn't you get tired of one background music?
You can listen to beautiful melody In the .
There are many piano and orchestra background music, and you can pick out what you want!
Choose your own background and desired background music!

3. A vast amount of content and quality that is different from the Clicker/Idle normal game.
- We will show quality contents that we could not see in Clicker/Idle normal games.
There are Exploration systems to get various items and Artifacts and Historic Site systems with small stories and special effects.
Life Restoration content that can restore lost life.
I will not let you get bored with the content that continues to be supplied!

4. You can create your own screen by collecting Artifacts!
- You can arrange your own Artifact with various shapes as you want, and you can decorate your own Celestial Tree.
